text: nirākarippavarkaḷ avarkaḷuṭaiya tūtarkaḷai nōkki, "niccayamāka nāṅkaḷ uṅkaḷai eṅkaḷ pūmiyiliruntu veḷiyēṟṟi viṭuvōm; allatu nīṅkaḷ eṅkaḷ mārkkattiṟkut tirumpiviṭa vēṇṭum" eṉṟu kūṟiṉārkaḷ, appōtu"niccayamāka nām inta aniyāyakkārarkaḷai aḻittu viṭuvōm" eṉṟu avarkaḷiṉ iṟaivaṉ avarkaḷukku aṟivittāṉ
